25.1.why: 25.1 protects a principled, innocent heart and collapses when exposed to cruelty; that's personal shock/innocence, not active trauma-field stabilization for others (Arcturus).

25.2.why: 25.2 radiates unguarded compassion that makes others feel spiritually safe, which matches Arcturus core holding a clean, safe field for nervous-system relief.

25.3.why: 25.3 survives violation and chaos and turns that pain into authentic compassion, which is Arcturus core trauma integration and repair after shock.

25.4.why: 25.4 stitches the group back together after harm through radical nonjudgment, which is strong Arcturus core post-crisis unification of the emotional field.

25.5.why: 25.5 is cast as the emergency soul medic who must cleanse corruption for everyone and then gets blamed as fake if healing isn't instant, which is Arcturus shadow burnout-healer / scapegoat dynamic.

25.6.why: 25.6 holds detached 'universal love' and can go cold like 'your pain is just a lesson,' which is Arcturus shadow clinical distance posing as compassion.

26.1.why: 26.1 wants fair deals and defends the tribe's interests; that's negotiation and willpower management, not trauma-field calibration or nervous-system regulation (Arcturus).

26.2.why: 26.2 can persuade and rearrange agreements with charisma, which is leverage/optics work, not stabilizing an overwhelmed emotional field (Arcturus).

26.3.why: 26.3 learns the ethics line by actually crossing it and recovering, which is hustle/reputation volatility, not clinical trauma cleanup (Arcturus).

26.4.why: 26.4 shapes the story so the group keeps leverage and can gatekeep resources, which is strategic spin and loyalty control, not emotional field stabilization (Arcturus).

26.5.why: 26.5 is called in to fix optics and salvage the deal and then blamed as manipulative, which is PR damage control, not healer-scapegoat around emotional regulation (Arcturus).

26.6.why: 26.6 guards the tribe's brand and narrative long-term, which is influence management, not trauma-field repair or nervous-system pacing (Arcturus).

27.1.why: 27.1 feels duty to feed and protect the close circle and will overgive to keep everyone alive, which is Pleiadian nurture/survival caregiving, not Arcturian clinical stabilization.

27.2.why: 27.2 quietly provides what people need and goes cold if taken for granted; that's tribe caregiving and resource warmth (Pleiades), not structured trauma-field calibration (Arcturus).

27.3.why: 27.3 learns boundaries by burning out in service and sliding into martyr script, which is overgiving/resentment caregiving, not technical nervous-system regulation (Arcturus).

27.4.why: 27.4 makes sure everyone gets fed and can weaponize access to enforce loyalty, which is tribal provision/control, not trauma-field stabilization (Arcturus).

27.5.why: 27.5 is expected to keep the whole tribe emotionally fed and then blamed as smothering when asking for reciprocity; that's caregiver projection (Pleiades core/shadow), not Arcturus healer-scapegoat.

27.6.why: 27.6 treats care as sacred structure and can judge others for not nurturing, which is guardian-nurturer ethic, not trauma-field technician work (Arcturus).

28.1.why: 28.1 needs proof the struggle actually matters and falls into 'what's the point' despair; that's existential purpose testing, not field stabilization (Arcturus).

28.2.why: 28.2 endures hardship quietly for a worthy cause and refuses help, which is lone-warrior survival, not group nervous-system repair (Arcturus).

28.3.why: 28.3 finds purpose by walking the edge of collapse and flirting with self-destruction, which is risk-ritual for meaning, not trauma-field stabilization (Arcturus).

28.4.why: 28.4 rallies allies around 'this is worth the fight' and pressures loyalty, which is cause evangelism, not calm containment of distress (Arcturus).

28.5.why: 28.5 is cast as fearless champion and crucified if they show weakness, which is heroic resistance projection, not healer projection (Arcturus).

28.6.why: 28.6 romanticizes suffering as identity ('the fight is meaningful because I chose it'), which is existential martyr logic, not trauma-field cleanup (Arcturus).

29.1.why: 29.1 wants a structurally sound yes and stalls from fear of overcommitting; that's selective devotion, not emotional field triage (Arcturus).

29.2.why: 29.2 quietly carries the work through perseverance and then resents being expected to carry everything forever; that's loyalty endurance, not nervous-system stabilization (Arcturus).

29.3.why: 29.3 goes all in too fast, burns out, collapses, and is seen as unreliable; that's boundary learning through overcommitment, not trauma-field repair (Arcturus).

29.4.why: 29.4 forges 'we're in this together' morale and pressures others to stay, which is contract/bond maintenance, not clinical calm-the-field work (Arcturus).

29.5.why: 29.5 is expected to hold the line when everyone else quits and then blamed as controlling if they call out quitters; that's reliability projection, not healer-scapegoat projection (Arcturus).

29.6.why: 29.6 treats a true yes as sacred oath and judges people for changing course; that's oathkeeping/discipline, not trauma-field stabilization (Arcturus).

30.1.why: 30.1 names 'I want this' without shame and fears wanting too much; that's raw emotional desire, not calibrated containment of intensity for others (Arcturus).

30.2.why: 30.2 magnetizes deep emotional experiences and withdraws bitterly if shamed; that's passion-pull and drama sensitivity, not field regulation (Arcturus).

30.3.why: 30.3 rides burn-surge heartbreak cycles and can chase chaos for the high, which escalates volatility instead of calming it (not Arcturus).

30.4.why: 30.4 ignites shared emotional heat and can stir drama to keep people bonded, which amps the field rather than stabilizing it (not Arcturus).

30.5.why: 30.5 is expected to voice the deep craving nobody else will admit and then blamed if desire disrupts comfort; that's passion-provoker projection, not healer-regulator projection (Arcturus).

30.6.why: 30.6 treats longing as sacred fuel and can act superior about the depth of that hunger, which is intensity worship, not trauma-field containment (Arcturus).

31.1.why: 31.1 wants structurally valid authority before speaking for others and won't speak unless status is legit; that's legitimacy politics, not trauma-field stabilization (Arcturus).

31.2.why: 31.2 naturally says 'this is the direction' and people listen, which is leadership voice, not nervous-system regulation (Arcturus).

31.3.why: 31.3 learns public leadership voice by messing up in view of everyone and adapting, which is spokesperson trial cycle, not emotional field triage (Arcturus).

31.4.why: 31.4 speaks as 'we' and aligns direction through consensus, sometimes politicking for loyalty; that's governance, not clinical de-escalation (Arcturus).

31.5.why: 31.5 is pushed to 'save the group' and then blamed as tyrant if people don't like the call; that's emergency leadership projection, not healer-scapegoat around regulation (Arcturus).

31.6.why: 31.6 embodies archetypal direction and can act above 'the uninformed masses'; that's rulership posture, not trauma-field repair (Arcturus).

32.1.why: 32.1 needs proof something can endure and clings to dying structures out of loyalty; that's survival-continuity anxiety (Draco core), not Arcturus regulation work.

32.2.why: 32.2 quietly senses which people/ideas are worth investing in long-term and grows bitter if ignored; that's loyalty/value assessment for continuity (Draco lens), not trauma-field stabilization (Arcturus).

32.3.why: 32.3 gambles reputation by backing what might survive and gets blamed if it fails; that's long-term survival vetting, not nervous-system triage (Arcturus).

32.4.why: 32.4 guards 'will this still feed us later?' and pressures obedience with fear of collapse, which is tribal continuity enforcement (Draco), not Arcturus clinical repair.

32.5.why: 32.5 is expected to prevent collapse and then blamed as controlling old guard, which is guardian-of-legacy projection (Draco), not healer-scapegoat projection (Arcturus).

32.6.why: 32.6 embodies 'I carry what must not be lost' and resists change as betrayal, which is lineage-preservation / loyalty enforcement (Draco core), not trauma-field calibration (Arcturus).
